item.description:
Adams Mill Trail (1.93 mile loop). Trail starts to left of restaurant (Adams Mill), follow along dike to the Hockanum River, up river to railroad trestle, across trestle to steps and downstream on Eighth Utilities property, along river to Adams Street, along sidewalk back to parking lot.

somewhat difficult walk in places, steep hills, narrow ledges, beautiful deep hemlock and pine forest, scenic sandstone gorge, need boots and walking stick, view old mill and dam.

Park at restaurant, 165 Adams Street, and meet there at 5:30 PM. Watch for Kevin's blue Dodge Grandcaravan Sport. I'll have a red/white Meetup sign on the window of the van for easier spotting. The hike should start at about 5:45 PM and take a little over an hour and end before 7 PM. No meal is planned after the hike.

Kevin S (http://hiking.meetup....) is leading on this one so please direct questions to him.

group.name: The Hartford Area Hikingâ„¢ Meetup Group

item.name: Kevin's Adams Mill Trail Hike in Manchester CT
